metadata.name: Better Unique Isaac Fight
metadata.description:
That mod is a reworked version of Unique Isaac Boss Fight created by Laraz (available here: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2563988750)
Reworked Enemies and Bosses is highly recommended
Main changes between this mod and Laraz' version: - All sprites are remade in mind of Reworked Foes mod - Lazarus and Judas won't fight their postmortem versions (Lazarus II and Dark Judas) but instead they'll fight against purified version of themselfs - Azazel's spirite has been replaced by Repented Azazel from Salvation mod
